title: Remove the `lang` parameter used by SKTextBlobBuilder
body:
**Description of Change**

The `lang` parameter is not used, so remove it.

**Bugs Fixed**

- Fixes #1189

**API Changes**

Internal only.

**Behavioral Changes**

None.

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
